opendial.bn.distribs.MultivariateDistribution

    • Uses of MultivariateDistribution in opendial

      Methods in opendial that return MultivariateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultivariateDistribution DialogueSystem.getContent(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> variables)
      Returns the probability distribution associated with the variables in the current dialogue state.
      Methods in opendial with parameters of type MultivariateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> DialogueSystem.addContent(MultivariateDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content (expressed as a multivariate distribution over variables) to the current dialogue state, and subsequently updates the dialogue state.

    • Uses of MultivariateDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs that implement MultivariateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmpiricalDistribution
      Distribution defined "empirically" in terms of a set of samples on a collection of random variables.
      class  MultivariateTable
      Representation of a multivariate categorical table P(X1,...Xn), where X1,...Xn are random variables.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs that return MultivariateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultivariateDistribution MultivariateDistribution.copy()
      Returns a copy of the distribution.
      Constructors in opendial.bn.distribs with parameters of type MultivariateDistribution 
      Constructor and Description
      MarginalDistribution(ProbDistribution condDistrib, MultivariateDistribution uncondDistrib)
      Creates a new marginal distribution given the two component distributions.

    • Uses of MultivariateDistribution in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference that return MultivariateDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default MultivariateDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> queryVars)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables, assuming no additional evidence.
      default MultivariateDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> queryVars, Assignment evidence)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables given the provided evidence.
      MultivariateDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(Query.ProbQuery query)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables given the provided evidence, all specified in the query
      MultivariateDistribution SwitchingAlgorithm.queryProb(Query.ProbQuery query)
      Selects the best algorithm for performing the inference on the provided probability query and return its result.
